long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Sort tabs within a window and then export a list of tab URLs. If you're a tab hoarder (like me), this is useful for snapshotting your work, deduplicating tabs, and then picking it up later. Note that the sorting process breaks tab groups if the final order interleaves tabs from different groups.

This extension is entirely "offline" and does not track, store, or share any data whatsoever. The "exported" tab URLs just appear in a new tab, from which you can copy-paste or save them.

The full source code is available at https://github.com/bsidhom/tab-sorter. It is intentionally minimal to make auditing easy.
